    • feedAnimal

      public void feedAnimal​(GameEnvironment game)
      Feeds all the animals currently stored in the farm. User selects item from their items owned loops through animal list and applies benefit of item to each animals happiness. Removes item from users item list
      Parameters:
      game - removes 1 from action remaining

    • getCrops

      public java.util.ArrayList<Crop> getCrops()

      Returns:
      crops array list of crops

      public double numberCrops()
      Get the number of crops currently growing
      Returns:
      numCrops number of crops

    • applyItem

      public void applyItem​(Crop crop)
      User chooses item and applies item to the choosen crop. Can either be crop item currently owned by farm or can use water for free. If item used, it is removed from the users owned items the items benefit is added to the crops growth rate
      Parameters:
      crop - the crop to have the item applied

    • chooseCrop

      public void chooseCrop​(GameEnvironment game)
      User chooses which crop to tend to, only one type of crop can be choosen. User choice is sent to applyItem method
      Parameters:
      game - remove 1 from action counter

    • editHappiness

      public void editHappiness()
      Changes the base happiness decline of all animals

    • playTime

      public void playTime()
      Plays with animals and increases each animals happiness Prints the happiness increase of each animals

    • addSpace

      public void addSpace()
      Increase the number of animals the farm can store and the number of crops the farm can growth

    • harvest

      public void harvest()
      Harvest all fully grown crops and adds it worth to farm balance

    • newDay

      public void newDay()
      Intializes new day, get daily income from all animals and add it to balance reduce the happiness of animals and apply growthrate of crops to current growthrate

    • getRandomDoubleBetweenRange

      public static java.lang.Double getRandomDoubleBetweenRange​(double min, double max)
      Generates random number to be used for random events
      Parameters:
      min - lowest val for random number
      max - highest val for random number
      Returns:
      x random number generated
